name: Chewie's AT-ST
Lore: 'Enclosed Chewie''s daring capture of an Imperial AT-ST helped turn the tide in the Battle of Endor.',
Text: 'Deploy only to Endor or same site as Chewie or opponent''s AT-ST. May add 2 pilots or passengers. Subtracts 1 from power of other AT-STs at same site. Immune to attrition < 4 when Chewie piloting.',
